monster_breeder.max_purity: Max purity reached, you need a new syringe!

monster_breeder.midnightconfig.title: Monster Breeder Config
monster_breeder.midnightconfig.enablePur: The 'Enable Purity' option has not been implemented and will not work!

Should purity be enabled.
If false all mechanics related to purity and stability will be disabled!
monster_breeder.midnightconfig.bloodPuri: When collecting blood, it's purity will be multiplied by this number.
monster_breeder.midnightconfig.shouldZom: Zombie Creepers Drop Mini TNT on Death
If true Zombie Creepers will drop their remaining mini TNT on death.
monster_breeder.midnightconfig.zombieCre: The chance of a Zombie Creeper dropping any of its mini TNT on death. Ignored if zombie creepers drop mini TNT on death is false.
